entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:48 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to ice pellets or snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
